info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Broadwater, Madison, central Beaverhead, southeastern Jefferson and northern Gallatin Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Three Forks to 7 miles northeast of Sheridan to 9 miles southwest of Dillon to 6 miles southeast of Lemhi. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief bursts of snow, rain, and graupel. Visibility may be reduced to one-quarter mile or less briefly. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Dillon, Sheridan, Virginia City, Belgrade, Three Forks, Manhattan, Whitehall, Ennis, Twin Bridges, Pony, Alder, Silver Star, Harrison, Big Sky, Cameron, Waterloo, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Glen and Cardwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
